templates.name: Mutual NDA v1
templates.description: Professional mutual confidentiality and non-disclosure agreement with comprehensive clauses

defaultValues.information_scope_text: All information, materials, documents, data, and other content

templates.name: Mutual NDA v1 (Formal Design)
templates.description: Formal design with underlined headings, increased spacing, and highlighted fillable fields

defaultValues.information_scope_text: All information, materials, documents, data, and other content

templates.name: Mutual NDA v1 (Professional Design)
templates.description: Enhanced professional design with bold underlined headings, circular numbered badges, gradient accents, and modern typography

defaultValues.information_scope_text: All information, materials, documents, data, and other content

doc_title.label: Document Title
doc_title.description: The title of the NDA document

party_1_name.label: Party 1 Name
party_1_name.description: Name of the first party (company or individual)

party_1_emails_joined.label: Party 1 Email(s)
party_1_emails_joined.description: Email address(es) for Party 1, separated by commas if multiple

party_1_signatory_name.label: Party 1 Signatory Name
party_1_signatory_name.description: Full name of the person signing for Party 1

party_1_signatory_title.label: Party 1 Signatory Title
party_1_signatory_title.description: Job title of the signatory (e.g., CEO, Director)

party_2_name.label: Party 2 Name
party_2_name.description: Name of the second party (company or individual)

party_2_emails_joined.label: Party 2 Email(s)
party_2_emails_joined.description: Email address(es) for Party 2, separated by commas if multiple

party_2_signatory_name.label: Party 2 Signatory Name
party_2_signatory_name.description: Full name of the person signing for Party 2

party_2_signatory_title.label: Party 2 Signatory Title
party_2_signatory_title.description: Job title of the signatory (e.g., CEO, Director)

information_scope_text.label: Information Scope
information_scope_text.description: Description of what information is covered by the agreement

purpose.label: Purpose
purpose.description: The purpose for which confidential information will be shared

governing_law_full.label: Governing Law
governing_law_full.description: State or jurisdiction governing the agreement

term_years_number.label: Term (Years)
term_years_number.description: Duration of the agreement in years (numeric)

term_years_words.label: Term (Words)
term_years_words.description: Duration of the agreement in years (written out)
